title: TransPerfect Legal Solutions Receives Top Honors in New York Law Journal Reader Rankings
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: TransPerfect Legal Solutions 
NEW YORK -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- TransPerfect Legal Solutions (TLS), a leading provider of e-discovery and global litigation support solutions for law firms and corporate legal departments, today announced that it has been recognized in the 2015 New York Law JournalReader Rankings. TLS received the top honor in the categories of “Best Foreign Language Translation Service Provider” and “Best Foreign Language Translation Software,” and was also recognized as a “Best eDiscovery Processing” provider. 
The annual survey consists of over 100 categories in areas including technology, research, accounting, insurance, financial services, litigation support, education, and more. More than 8,400 readers participated in this year’s survey. 
“Being able to deliver for our clients and helping them achieve their goals is reward enough for us,” noted Jim Iseman, President of TLS’s Litigation Technology Group. “To have our efforts acknowledged by an outside publication is a bonus, and knowing that these awards are based on votes cast by readers makes this very special. We greatly appreciate the support and loyalty of our clients, and we look forward to continuing to serve their needs in the future.” 
About TransPerfect Legal Solutions 
TransPerfect Legal Solutions (TLS) is an industry leader in global legal support. Founded in 1992, TLS offers a full suite of services, including forensic technology and consulting , e-discovery and early data assessment , managed review and legal staffing , language services , deposition and trial support , and paper discovery and production . With offices in 90 cities across 6 continents, TLS is a trusted partner for every Am Law 200 and Global 100 law firm, as well as the majority of Fortune 500 corporate legal departments.
